"Afin":
"Whew, finally done! I knew you'd be a
huge help, and boy, was I right!"

"But I wonder... Why do you think the Dragonkin
here have turned so aggressive, just like
the ones over in Volcanic Caverns?"

"Actually, maybe we shouldn't worry about
that now. Let's worry about getting back in
one piece instead!"

"ひゅー、終わったぁ！
やっぱお前が横にいてくれると
頼もしいよ。"

"うーん、それにしてもここの龍族も
火山洞窟のやつらと同じように
凶暴化しちまってるんだな。"

"……今考えても仕方ないか。
とりあえず帰還しようぜ。"
